original_title: Los peregrinos (notas y fragmentos del viaje)
overview: A pair of wandering, young eyes traveling through Spain from the point of view of a train cabin. A reflective diary where the railway poetics and changing landscapes form a contemplative whole. A piece that, from the physical transit, tries to identify what could be understood in another sphere as the journey of life itself.
title: The Pilgrims (voyage notes and fragments)
